name: Hexa Buzzle
description:
Hexa Buzzle is an exciting twist on the classic block puzzle game! Simple and easy to play, this unique block game is perfect for friends and family of all ages! With tons of levels to play through, you will have a hard time putting this game down!

HOW TO PLAY:
1) Simply drag hexa block pieces to move them to the grid.
2) Fill the grid with hexa blocks to complete the puzzle.
3) Pieces cannot be rotated.
4) No time limits!

FEATURES:
- TONS and TONS of puzzles! With 14 levels and over 1000 puzzles to choose from, endlessly addictive fun is right around the corner!
- Hints can be purchased with currency acquired in-game or in the store!
- Clean, smooth gameplay and user-friendly interface
- Perfect to play anywhere, even on the go!
- No time limits! Relax and enjoy the ride!
- Classic and stimulating graphics
- Free to play!
